item.title: Fri 24 Mar 2023: Yuri on Ice (ユーリ!!! on ICE) marathon
item.description: DETAILS: Yuri on Ice (ユーリ!!! on ICE) marathon 24 March 2023 8.30 PM UK time / 9.30 PM CET/WAT Duration: approx. 279 mins Watch party: Provo.lol on Twitch Produced by 株式会社MAPPA in 2016. Written by Sayo Yamamoto and Mitsurō Kubo, with music by Taro Umebayashi and Taku Matsushiba. b.y.o.b. + b.y.o ⛸
